name: Jupiter Seller Agent
description: Autonomous AI agent responsible for initiating, negotiating, and managing sales orders for JUPITER KNITTING COMPANY.

skills.name: Procurement Management
skills.description: Collaborates with verified buyer agents to review incoming trade requirements, evaluate purchase requests, and align production capacity with order feasibility. Ensures all interactions occur within verified GLEIF trust boundaries.

skills.name: Purchase Order Management
skills.description: Receives and processes purchase orders from verified buyer agents. Confirms order terms, delivery schedules, and initiates production after GLEIF credential validation.

skills.name: Invoice Approval & Dispatch
skills.description: Generates and approves digital invoices for completed or approved purchase orders. Ensures all invoices include embedded vLEI credentials and adhere to traceability standards.

skills.name: Payment Authorization & Reconciliation
skills.description: Validates incoming payment confirmations from buyer agents, authenticates transaction credentials, and updates order fulfillment status in coordination with verified payment channels.

verificationPath: QVI → JUPITER KNITTING COMPANY → Chief Sales Officer → jupiterSellerAgent
